column1: |                                                                                                                  | Trains longer than 80m / 12SLU / 4 cars cannot be stood at Platform 2 for longer than 2 minutes due to level |

|                                                                                                                  | crossing being automatically enabled when approaching the platform. Pathing time must be added approaching   |

|                                                                                                                  | Appledore if more time is required                                                                           |

|                                                                                                                  | Refer to Kent Timetable Planning Rules – SO130                                                               |

| Trains formed of a 12 car Class 700 EMU must not be planned into this station, due to operational restrictions   |                                                                                                              |

| Trains formed of a 12 car Class 700 EMU must not be planned to use this station, due to operational restrictions |                                                                                                              |

| Trains formed of a 12 car Class 700 EMU must not be planned to use this station, due to operational restrictions |                                                                                                              |
